Description: Battlecry: Destroy a Murloc and gain +2/+2. Murloc.  It's what's for dinner.

Name: Kidnapper
Description: Combo: Return a minion to its owner's hand. He just wants people to see his vacation photos.

Name: Molten Giant
Description: Costs (1) less for each damage your hero has taken. He gets terrible heartburn.  BECAUSE HE IS FULL OF LAVA.

Name: Mountain Giant
Description: Costs (1) less for each other card in your hand. His mother said that he was just big boned.

Name: Murloc Warleader
Description: ALL other Murlocs have +2/+1. Do Murlocs ever get tired of making the same old sound?  Nope!  Mrglglrglglglglglglgl!

Name: Patient Assassin
Description: Stealth . Destroy any minion damaged by this minion. He’s not really that patient. It just takes a while for someone to walk by that he can actually reach.

Name: Pit Lord
Description: Battlecry: Deal 5 damage to your hero. Mannoroth
column9: Magtheridon
column10: and Brutallus may be dead
column11: but it turns out there are a LOT of pit lords.

Name: Sea Giant
Description: Costs (1) less for each other minion on the battlefield. See?  Giant.

Name: Shadow of Nothing
Description: Mindgames whiffed! Your opponent had no minions!

Name: Southsea Captain
Description: Your other Pirates have +1/+1. When he saves enough plunder
column9: he's going to commission an enormous captain's hat.  He has hat envy.

Name: Al'Akir the Windlord
Description: Windfury
column9: Charge
column10: Divine Shield
column11: Taunt He is the weakest of the four Elemental Lords.  And the other three don't let him forget it.

Name: Alexstrasza
Description: Battlecry: Set a hero's remaining Health to 15. Alexstrasza the Life-Binder brings life and hope to everyone.  Except Deathwing.  And Malygos.  And Nekros.

Name: Archmage Antonidas
Description: Whenever you cast a spell
column9: put a 'Fireball' spell into your hand. Antonidas was the Grand Magus of the Kirin Tor
column10: and Jaina's mentor.  This was a big step up from being Grand Magus of Jelly Donuts.

Name: Baron Geddon
Description: At the end of your turn
column9: deal 2 damage to ALL other characters. Baron Geddon was Ragnaros's foremost lieutenant
column10: until he got FIRED.

Name: Bloodmage Thalnos
Description: Spell Damage +1 . Deathrattle: Draw a card. He's in charge of the Annual Scarlet Monastery Blood Drive!

Name: Cairne Bloodhoof
Description: Deathrattle: Summon a 4/5 Baine Bloodhoof. Cairne was killed by Garrosh
column9: so... don't put this guy in a Warrior deck.  It's pretty insensitive.

Name: Captain Greenskin
Description: Battlecry: Give your weapon +1/+1. He was this close to piloting a massive juggernaut into Stormwind Harbor. If it weren't for those pesky kids!

Name: Cenarius
Description: Choose One - Give your other minions +2/+2; or Summon two 2/2 Treants with Taunt . Yes
column9: he's a demigod. No
column10: he doesn't need to wear a shirt.

Name: Deathwing
Description: Battlecry: Destroy all other minions and discard your hand. Once a noble dragon known as Neltharion
column9: Deathwing lost his mind and shattered Azeroth before finally being defeated.  Daddy issues?

Name: Edwin VanCleef
Description: Combo: Gain +2/+2 for each card played earlier this turn. He led the Stonemasons in the reconstruction of Stormwind
column9: and when the nobles refused to pay
column10: he founded the Defias Brotherhood to

column9: Sen'jin Shieldmasta'
column10: and Ragnaros the Firelord.

Description: Battlecry: Summon an AWESOME invention. He's the leader of the gnomes
column9: and an incredible inventor.  He's getting better
column10: too; He turns things into chickens WAY less than he used to.

Description: Charge . Enrage: +6 Attack Grommash drank the tainted blood of Mannoroth
column9: dooming the orcs to green skin and red eyes!  Maybe not his best decision.

Name: Gruul
Description: At the end of each turn
column9: gain +1/+1 . He's Gruul "the Dragonkiller".  He just wanted to cuddle them… he never meant to…

Name: Harrison Jones
Description: Battlecry: Destroy your opponent's weapon and draw cards equal to its Durability. “That belongs in the Hall of Explorers!”

Name: Hogger
Description: At the end of your turn
column9: summon a 2/2 Gnoll with Taunt . Hogger is super powerful. If you kill him

column9: summon a 2/1 Flame of Azzinoth. Illidan's brother
column10: Malfurion
column12: 000 years.  Stormrages are not good at letting go of grudges.

Name: King Krush
Description: Charge The best defense against King Krush is to have someone you don’t like standing in front of you.

Name: King Mukla
Description: Battlecry: Give your opponent 2 Bananas. King Mukla wanders Jaguero Isle
column9: searching for love.

Name: Leeroy Jenkins
Description: Charge . Battlecry: Summon two 1/1 Whelps for your opponent. At least he has Angry Chicken.

Name: Lord Jaraxxus

Description: Whenever a player casts a spell
column9: put a copy into the other player’s hand. Lorewalker Cho archives and shares tales from the land of Pandaria

Name: Malygos
Description: Spell Damage +5 Malygos hates it when mortals use magic.  He gets so mad!

Name: Nozdormu
Description: Players only have 15 seconds to take their turns. Time to write some flavor text.

Description: Charge . Has +1 Attack for each other Murloc on the battlefield. He's a legend among murlocs.  "Mrghllghghllghg!"
column9: they say.

Name: Onyxia
Description: Battlecry: Summon 1/1 Whelps until your side of the battlefield is full. Onyxia long manipulated the Stormwind Court by disguising herself as Lady Katrana Prestor.   You would have thought that the giant wings and scales would have been a giveaway.

Description: Double the damage and healing of your spells and Hero Power. He's been exiled from his home
column9: and all his brothers turned evil
column10: but otherwise he doesn't have a lot to complain about.

Name: Ragnaros the Firelord
Description: Can't Attack.  At the end of your turn
column9: deal 8 damage to a random enemy. Ragnaros was summoned by the Dark Iron dwarves
column10: who were eventually enslaved by the Firelord.  Summoning Ragnaros often doesn’t work out the way you want it to.

Name: The Black Knight
Description: Battlecry: Destroy an enemy minion with Taunt . He was sent by the Lich King to disrupt the Argent Tournament.   We can pretty much mark that a failure.
